snippet: The number of shootings by the police so far this year has nearly doubled, prompting the call from the civilian board that oversees the force.
abstract: Civilian board that oversees Los Angeles police address rise in number of shootings by police and highlight need to build confidence in minority communities; shootings by police in LA have nearly doubled from 23 to 45 in same time frame over year.
lead_paragraph: The number of shootings by the police so far this year has nearly doubled, prompting the call from the civilian board that oversees the force.

headline.main: Los Angeles Police Urged to Review Use of Force After ‘Alarming’ Rise in Shootings
headline.print_headline: Los Angeles Police Urged to Review Use of Force After ‘Alarming’ Rise in Shootings
